name: outro
commands: Guys, look.|That pillar is sorta strange.
It's got a strange tome sitting on it.|Do you think this is the cause of the events here?
Great work!|Let me take a look.
Hmm...interesting|Very interesting.|By the looks of it, it seems that this tome here was the catalyst.
This tome feeds off the intent of others.|It can cause the malice in people to rise thereby creating chaos.
Yes...|Perhaps by the time they realized, it was already too late.|That's why this pillar is here.|However, you can wield it.
Yes, you.|You hold light magic so you're resistant to its calls of darkness.|This tome will be quite the boon for you.|Want it? If not, I'll safeguard it.|Think about it
Hey...I don't fully understand this magic but...|This sounds like a terrible thing to have.
I agree with Senya.|It's caused this whole place to ruins.|Even if you're resistant, you're not immune.
But what if the power can help us defeat that mage?
I don't think it's worth the risk.|It's not that we don't want to defeat the mage...|it's just that we're worried.
We don't know anything else about this tome.|It might be powerful, but it's more trouble than its worth.
You're resistant to its effects. Could be useful as a powerful weapon.|But it's to you.
I think it's worth the risk.
MC...|Alright I can't say I'm happy about your decision, but...|I'll trust you.
Don't make us worry, got it?
That tome will be in a better place with you, Sir.
Alright, that take cares of that.
Thank goodness.|I would have hated it if that tome had to travel with us.
That's a relief.|Thanks for heeding our advice.
Let's head back to town now. Best not to linger here.|Who knows what else might be hiding here.
